SEARCH
Module jtamaro

Package jtamaro.interaction

package jtamaro.interaction
Interaction allows to develop an interactive application in a purely functional way.
  • Interaction: interaction is the configuration for an interactive application or simulation
  • KeyboardChar: character on the keyboard that was typed
  • KeyboardKey: key on the keyboard that was either pressed down or released
  • MouseAction: mouse action (one of MousePressAction, MouseReleaseAction, MouseMoveAction or MouseDragAction)
  • Class
    Description
    Coordinate
    Mouse coordinate.
    Interaction<M>
    An Interaction is the configuration for an interactive application or simulation.
    KeyboardChar
    Character typed on a keyboard.
    KeyboardKey
    Keyboard key that was either pressed or released.
    MouseAction<M>
    Mouse actions for an Interaction.
    MouseButton
    Mouse (or trackpad) button that was either pressed or released.
    MouseDragAction<M>
    Mouse cursor drag event action.
    MouseMoveAction<M>
    Mouse cursor move event action.
    MousePressAction<M>
    Mouse button press event action.
    MouseReleaseAction<M>
    Mouse button release event action.
